panel-1: Reinforcement Learning is a type of AI that learns through trial and error by interacting with the world. Itâ€™s similar to how humans and animals learn.
panel-2: AI gets rewards and penalties while doing its best effort to perform a task.
panel-3: The AI repeats the best actions it learned (Exploit), but also needs to try new things (Explore).
panel-4: The robot slowly learns the path to the exit. If you change the maze, the robot will adapt its training.
